explanation: [0-0] An orange bus appears at the bottom of the screen, its eyes looking upwards. Above the bus, there are an eye pattern, a pumpkin lantern pattern, and a ghost pattern, in that order. The background behind the bus is filled with many blue stars and a yellow moon.

[0-2] The eye pattern starts to blink, followed by the ghost pattern. The bus looks in the direction of the ghost. Next, the pumpkin pattern starts to blink, and the bus raises its head, smiles, and opens its mouth to look at the pumpkin.
